summary: Tired of your normal followers? Let Sofia keep you company. She's the best thief you'll ever find... That is, if you can find her.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of your normal followers? Let Sofia keep you company. She's the best thief you'll ever find... That is, if you can find her.

Sofia is a Nord, raised in Riften - the city to the South East - she is stealthy as hell.

Location:
I did not place her in any given place as I feel there is no need for that. If you want her as your follower all you have to do is:
Press "`"
Type in "help 'Sofia'"
Once you find her with her console code...
Type in "player.placeatme (her console code) 1
She should then appear right in front of you.

Installation:
Use Nexus Mod Manager to install (recommended) or install manually.

Uninstallation:
Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager.

Known Issues:
If she does not have follower dialogue then you can:
Either use "player.setrelationshiprank (her console code) 4
Or use "addfac 19809 1" and "addfac 5c84d 1" and then the previous if all else fails.

Future Plans:
I plan on adding custom voice once I find a girl with a voice sexy enough.
I also plan on adding other mods to this to make her more unique.
author: KingCarlitos
